This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=EMAPI.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-11T10:06:33Z Lois Child 2015-03-11T10:05:57+00:00 2015-03-11T10:05:57+00:00 Forwarded message from Gabriella Sciarrone https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EMAPI;bd0c0687.1503 From: Sciarrone, Gabriella [mailto:Gabriella.Sciarrone@tandf.co.uk]<br>Sent: 11 March 2015 08:55<br>To: EMAPI-request@jiscmail.ac.uk<br>Subject: Could you please post the below message? Thanks<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>Taylor and Francis is currently offering FREE access to all the latest articles on Botany and Plant Science.<br><br>Just click http://bit.ly/1M9anGX and claim your free access today.<br><br>Kind Regards<br><br>Gabriella<br><br>Gabriella Sciarrone | Marketing Coordinator<br>Taylor & Francis Group.<br>4 Park Square, Milton Park, Abingdon, Oxon, OX14 4RN, UK.<br>Tel: +44 (0)20 755 19222<br>Web: www.tandfonline.com<http://www.tandfonline.com/><br>e-mail: gabriella.sciarrone@tandf.co.uk<mailto:gabriella.sciarrone@tandf.co.uk> [...] Gail Rice 2014-07-31T19:50:46+01:00 2014-07-31T19:50:46+01:00 2013 Impact Factor Score Announced for AoB PLANTS https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EMAPI;a3ed86c9.1407 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>AoB PLANTS is pleased to announce that its first Impact Factor score was released by Thomson Reuters on July 29 in their Journal Citation Report. Our score for 2013 came in at 1.743, which ranks us in the top half of all journals in the plant sciences (72 of 196). Although not entirely satisfied with an Impact Factor score under 2.0, we are off to a strong start and will strive to increase our score in subsequent years. [...] Gail Rice 2014-05-28T21:41:59+01:00 2014-05-28T21:41:59+01:00 Social Media Editor for AoB PLANTS https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EMAPI;fc0c9474.1405 The online journal AoB PLANTS welcomes applications for the part-time position of Social Media Editor. Published by Oxford University Press, AoB PLANTS is an open-access journal that has been publishing peer-reviewed articles in all aspects of basic and applied plant biology since 2010, with an intensifying focus on environmental biology (http://aobplants.oxfordjournals.org). Submitted manuscripts undergo rigorous double-blind evaluations and articles are published online within days of acceptance. At present, authors are not charged open-access fees but a modest one will be initiated in the future. The journal is indexed in Web of Science as well as other Thomson Reuters products, and [...]
